TopicTitle: Mod to see our Pilot's/Scientist's/Engineer's stats outside Ast. Complex

Articles.Content:
Title says it all

I need to know which guys did go to Minmus and which ones went to the Mun so they all gain experience.

Right now i need to go to the astronaut complex, but even then the last 2-3 entries of the list will have their pop up stats go off screen...
